short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes 'Bucknell' to 'Buttsmell' and things like 'liberal arts' to 'liberal farts'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension aims to enhance your web browsing experience by modifying the name of a well known university located in Lewisburg, PA. The product works well on websites such as "bucknell.edu" or anything affiliated with that same university (This extension does not always work on Facebook, Twitter, and some other media websites. In case you should experience a website broken that was previously always fine, try disabling this extension)
